9 namespace cpr_rviz

13  RobotPanel::RobotPanel( QWidget* parent ) :
14  rviz::Panel( parent ),
15  m_ConnectButton(this),
16  m_EnableButton(this),
17  m_InputGroupBox(this),
18  m_OutputGroupBox(this),
19  m_ReferenceButton(this),
20  m_ZeroButton(this),
21  m_OverrideSlider(Qt::Horizontal,this),
22  m_OverrideLabel(this),
23  m_OverrideSliderValid(false)
24  {
25  InitializeROS();
26  InitializeState();
27  InitializeUI();
28  }
29 
31  RobotPanel::~RobotPanel()
32  {
33  m_ControlButtonsLayout.setParent(nullptr);
34  m_JointsLayout.setParent(nullptr);
35  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Inputs.size();i++)
36  {
37  delete m_pInputs[i];
38  }
39  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Outputs.size();i++)
40  {
41  delete m_pOutputs[i];
42  }
43  delete[] m_pOutputs;
44  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
45  {
46  delete m_pJointControls[i];
47  }
48  delete[] m_pJointControls;
49  }
50 
52  void RobotPanel::InitializeUI()
53  {
54  m_ModelNameLabel.setText(m_ModelName.c_str());
55  m_MainLayout.addRow(tr("Model:"), &m_ModelNameLabel);
56  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ConnectButton);
57  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_EnableButton);
58  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ReferenceButton);
59  m_ControlButtonsLayout.addWidget(&m_ZeroButton);
60  m_ReferenceButton.setText("Reference");
61  m_ZeroButton.setText("Set Zero");
62  double k=0.5*(double)m_CountJoints;
63  int rows=(int)round(k+0.5);
64  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_ControlButtonsLayout);
65  m_MainLayout.addRow(tr("Override:"), &m_OverrideLabel);
66  m_OverrideSlider.setMinimum(0);
67  m_OverrideSlider.setMaximum(100);
68  m_OverrideSlider.setTickInterval(10);
69  m_OverrideSlider.setTickPosition(QSlider::TicksBelow);
70  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_OverrideSlider);
71  m_pInputs=new QCheckBox*[m_Inputs.size()];
72  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Inputs.size();i++)
73  {
74  m_pInputs[i]=new QCheckBox(&m_InputGroupBox);
75  m_pInputs[i]->setText(m_Inputs[i].c_str());
76  m_InputLayout.addWidget(m_pInputs[i],i/4,i%4);
77  }
78  m_InputGroupBox.setLayout(&m_InputLayout);
79  m_InputGroupBox.setTitle("Digital inputs:");
80  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_InputGroupBox);
81  m_pOutputs=new TaggedButton*[m_Outputs.size()];
82  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Outputs.size();i++)
83  {
84  m_pOutputs[i]=new TaggedButton((int)i,&m_OutputGroupBox);
85  m_pOutputs[i]->setText(m_Outputs[i].c_str());
86  m_OutputLayout.addWidget(m_pOutputs[i],i/4,i%4);
87  m_pOutputs[i]->setCheckable(true);
88  connect(m_pOutputs[i],&TaggedButton::buttonClicked,this,&RobotPanel::OnOutputButtonClicked);
89  }
90  m_OutputGroupBox.setLayout(&m_OutputLayout);
91  m_OutputGroupBox.setTitle("Digital outputs:");
92  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_OutputGroupBox);
93  m_pJointControls=new JointControl*[m_CountJoints];
94  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
95  {
96  m_pJointControls[i]=new JointControl(i,this);
97  m_JointsLayout.addWidget(m_pJointControls[i],i/2,i%2);
98  }
99  m_MainLayout.addRow(&m_JointsLayout);
100  setLayout(&m_MainLayout);
101  OnStatusFlagsChanged();
102  connect(&m_ConnectButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnConnectButtonClicked);
103  connect(&m_EnableButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnEnableButtonClicked);
104  connect(&m_ReferenceButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnReferenceButtonClicked);
105  connect(&m_ZeroButton, &QAbstractButton::clicked, this, &RobotPanel::OnZeroButtonClicked);
106  connect(&m_OverrideSlider,&QAbstractSlider::valueChanged,this,&RobotPanel::OnOverrideSliderValueChanged);
107  }
108 
111  void RobotPanel::OnOutputButtonClicked(int tag, bool bChecked)
112  {
113  if(!m_pOutputs[tag]->isChecked())
114  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DOUT_DISABLE, 0.0,tag);
115  else
116  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DOUT_ENABLE, 0.0,tag);
117  }
118 
119 
121  void RobotPanel::OnOverrideSliderValueChanged(int value)
122  {
123  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_OVERRIDE, 0.01*(double)m_OverrideSlider.value(),0);
124  }
125 
127  void RobotPanel::OnConnectButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
128  {
129  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED)
130  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_CONNECT, 0.0, 0);
131  else
132  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DISCONNECT, 0.0, 0);
133  }
134 
136  void RobotPanel::OnReferenceButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
137  {
138  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_STARTREFERENCING, 0.0, 0);
139  }
140 
142  void RobotPanel::OnZeroButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
143  {
144  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_SETZERO, 0.0, 0);
145  }
146 
148  void RobotPanel::OnEnableButtonClicked(bool bChecked)
149  {
150  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::MotorModule::STATUSFLAG_MASK_ANY_ERROR)
151  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_ENABLE, 0.0, 0);
152  else
153  RobotCommand(cpr_robot::Robot::COMMAND_DISABLE, 0.0, 0);
154  }
155 
157  void RobotPanel::InitializeState()
158  {
159  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfoResponse rbtInfo=GetRobotInfo();
160  m_CountJoints=rbtInfo.CountJoints;
161  m_Inputs.clear();
162  for(size_t i=0;i<rbtInfo.InputChannels.size();i++)
163  m_Inputs.push_back(rbtInfo.InputChannels[i]);
164  m_Outputs.clear();
165  for(size_t i=0;i<rbtInfo.OutputChannels.size();i++)
166  m_Outputs.push_back(rbtInfo.OutputChannels[i]);
167  m_ModelName=rbtInfo.Model;
168  m_StatusFlags=cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED;
169  }
170 
172  void RobotPanel::InitializeROS()
173  {
174  m_GetRobotInfoClient=m_Node.serviceClient<cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo>("/GetRobotInfo");
175  m_RobotStateSubscriber=m_Node.subscribe("/robot_state",10,&RobotPanel::RobotStateCallback, this);
176  m_RobotCommandClient= m_Node.serviceClient<cpr_robot::RobotCommand>("/RobotCommand");
177  m_InputChannelsSubscriber=m_Node.subscribe("/InputChannels",10,&RobotPanel::InputChannelsCallback, this);
178  m_OutputChannelsSubscriber=m_Node.subscribe("/OutputChannels",10,&RobotPanel::OutputChannelsCallback, this);
179  }
180 
183  void RobotPanel::RobotStateCallback(const cpr_robot::RobotState::ConstPtr& msg)
184  {
185  if(m_StatusFlags!=msg->StatusFlags)
186  {
187  m_StatusFlags=msg->StatusFlags;
188  OnStatusFlagsChanged();
189  }
190  if(m_Override!=msg->Override)
191  {
192  m_Override=msg->Override;
193  OnOverrideChanged();
194  }
195  if(!m_OverrideSliderValid)
196  {
197  if((m_StatusFlags&0xffff)==0x0000)
198  {
199  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(true);
200  m_OverrideSlider.setValue((int)(100.0*m_Override));
201  m_OverrideSliderValid=true;
202  }
203  }
204  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
205  {
206  if(msg->StatusFlags&(((uint32_t)1)<<(16+i)))
207  m_pJointControls[i]->set_IsReferenced(true);
208  else
209  m_pJointControls[i]->set_IsReferenced(false);
210  }
211  }
212 
215  void RobotPanel::InputChannelsCallback(const cpr_robot::ChannelStates::ConstPtr& msg)
216  {
217  for(size_t i=0;i<msg->state.size();i++)
218  {
219  m_pInputs[i]->setCheckState(msg->state[i]?Qt::Checked:Qt::Unchecked);
220  }
221  }
222 
225  void RobotPanel::OutputChannelsCallback(const cpr_robot::ChannelStates::ConstPtr& msg)
226  {
227  for(size_t i=0;i<msg->state.size();i++)
228  {
229  m_pOutputs[i]->setChecked(msg->state[i]);
230  }
231  }
232 
234  void RobotPanel::OnOverrideChanged()
235  {
236  std::stringstream sstr;
237  sstr << ::std::fixed << std::setprecision(1) << 100.0*m_Override << " %";
238  m_OverrideLabel.setText(sstr.str().c_str());
239  }
240 
242  void RobotPanel::OnStatusFlagsChanged()
243  {
244  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::Robot::STATUSFLAG_DISCONNECTED)
245  {
246  m_ConnectButton.setText(tr("Connect"));
247  m_EnableButton.setEnabled(false);
248  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(false);
249  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(false);
250  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Enable"));
251  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
252  m_pJointControls[i]->Disable();
253  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Inputs.size();i++)
254  m_pInputs[i]->setEnabled(false);
255  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Outputs.size();i++)
256  m_pOutputs[i]->setEnabled(false);
257  }
258  else
259  {
260  m_ConnectButton.setText(tr("Disconnect"));
261  m_EnableButton.setEnabled(true);
262  m_OverrideSlider.setEnabled(false);
263  if(m_StatusFlags&cpr_robot::MotorModule::STATUSFLAG_MASK_ANY_ERROR)
264  {
265  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
266  m_pJointControls[i]->Disable();
267  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Enable"));
268  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(false);
269  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Inputs.size();i++)
270  m_pInputs[i]->setEnabled(false);
271  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Outputs.size();i++)
272  m_pOutputs[i]->setEnabled(false);
273  }
274  else
275  {
276  for(uint32_t i=0;i<m_CountJoints;i++)
277  m_pJointControls[i]->Enable();
278  m_EnableButton.setText(tr("Disable"));
279  m_ReferenceButton.setEnabled(true);
280  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Inputs.size();i++)
281  m_pInputs[i]->setEnabled(true);
282  for(size_t i=0;i<m_Outputs.size();i++)
283  m_pOutputs[i]->setEnabled(true);
284  }
285  }
286  m_OverrideSliderValid=false;
287  }
288 
290  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfoResponse RobotPanel::GetRobotInfo()
291  {
292  cpr_robot::GetRobotInfo srv;
293  srv.request.Sender="cpr_robot::RobotPanel";
294  if (m_GetRobotInfoClient.call(srv))
295  {
296  ROS_INFO("GetRobotInfo: model %s, %ui joints.",srv.response.Model.c_str(),srv.response.CountJoints);
297  }
298  else
299  {
300  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service GetRobotInfo.");
301  srv.response.Model="Unknown Robot";
302  srv.response.CountJoints=0;
303  }
304  return srv.response;
305  }
306 
311  cpr_robot::RobotCommandResponse RobotPanel::RobotCommand(const uint32_t commandId, const double payloadFloat, const int64_t payloadInt)
312  {
313  cpr_robot::RobotCommand srv;
314  srv.request.Sender="cpr_robot::RobotPanel";
315  srv.request.CommandId=commandId;
316  srv.request.PayloadFloat=payloadFloat;
317  srv.request.PayloadInt=payloadInt;
318  if (!m_RobotCommandClient.call(srv))
319  {
320  ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service RobotCommand.");
321  }
322  return srv.response;
323  }
